_header: Pride Covetous Sloth Wrath and Onde
_description: The Seven Deadly Sins — one long couplet

CamEmm27.Transcription:
Prute ȝisscinge slevþe wrethe and ondeGlotonie and lecherie
                    God bringe hom vt of londe
CamEmm27.Editions:
Bloomfield,  Morton. 
             The Seven Deadly Sins….
         East Lansing, MI: Michigan State College Press, 1952: 169.
